Title: Loonsmasha Fanatics
Legend: Armed with massive wrecking balls attached to lengths of chain, Loonsmasha Fanatics are driven loopy with fungus brew then unleashed upon the enemy in a whirling storm. Though they inevitably come to grief, they are sure to cause bloody carnage first.
Intro: Each model in a Loonsmasha Fanatics unit is armed with a Ball and Chain.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Skulkmob Horde

Rules.Name: Whirling Death
Rules.Fluff: To attack a grot Fanatic you must first dodge past their ball and chain.
Rules.Rule: The strike-first effect applies to this unit.
